name: One Room RPG
description:
Weak and afraid, you're dropped into the world with only one objective: kill the final boss. It doesn't matter how you got here or what bosses you had to have fought to get this far, just know that there is only one boss remaining for you to beat and win the game.

In this boss fight, dying doesn't reset the boss or your character. You are meant to upgrade your abilities and stats throughout the fight in an attempt to beat this boss in the fastest possible time. However, dying is still a 10 second penalty.

Use W-A-S-D or the arrow keys to move and click on the upgrades to buy them.

Good luck!

Made in 42 hours for the GMTK 2019 game jam.
